executable.title: Print image
executable.description: print image (4D image, tensors, SH coefficients).

image.name: _BaseImageFile
image.description: Input baseline image file (VectorImage or 4D image). If provided, show the differnece between two images.

integer-vector.name: _Box
integer-vector.label: views
integer-vector.description: only generate mesh from a given box (x0,x1,y0,y1,z0,z1).

double.name: _Power
double.description: Power argument. 1.0: original value on mesh, 2.0: pow 2, 0.5: sqrt.

file.name: _OrientationsFile
file.label: Orientations File
file.description: Text file that contains the gradient orientations of the data. It is to generate spherical function samples when the input image is SH coefficients.

boolean.name: _PrintAllVoxels
boolean.description: If set, print all voxels. Otherwise, print only non-zero voxels

integer-enumeration.name: _DifferencePercent
integer-enumeration.description: 0: do not show difference percentage; 1: show percentage of the diff when -b is given; 2: show only the summary of percentage.

string-enumeration.name: _TensorStorageFormat
